form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Franken (for himself and Mr. Cassidy) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the State report card provisions of section 1111(h) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to require the disaggregation of the educational outcomes of students with disabilities by disability category.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Disaggregating Student Outcomes by Disability Category Act.

section.header: Disaggregating student outcomes by disability category
section.text: Section 1111(h)(1)(C)(i) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 6311(h)(1)(C)(i)) is amended by inserting disability category as described in subparagraphs (A)(i) and (if applicable for the State) (B)(i) of section 602(3) of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act, after disability status,.
